Reviews.Title: pretty much a basic with some extra features
Reviews.Author: Lady M
Reviews.Content: As an owner of the original neon it lasted a long time and no issues of all the years I owned it not until the third ended up losing it on vacation so I decided to try this new Neon II so far its been quite smooth usage very similar to the original neon just some extra buttons that make it easier to access texts and see your contacts. Otherwise its a basic nothing wow factor just a good sturdy phone that has good texting ability and the calls seem to be clear for the better part. Overall a very easy mobile to use nothing too techy but is fast can use apps and a has a good gps. Just take note the charger does not seem to last oddly so either have one laying about or order a new one they are cheap enough the phone works still in tip top condition just the charger died after three uses.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: Lobstha
Reviews.Content: Ordered the phone to replace daughters broken cell.  SIM card was quick and easy to install.  Had some issues with charging the battery, turns out the supplied charger was no good.  No big deal used one of the many chargers laying about and the phone came right to life. Quality is in line with the price.  I

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: cellthehut
Reviews.Content: you may ask yourself why in the age of tech would you buy this phone. Well I'm going tell you. 1 I don't need a smart phone. 2 I can text at the speed of light just like all those smart phoners . 3 bills are cheaper with a basic phone. but really it works well and was worth the cash I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: A. Bisbing "jack of all trades / master of none"
Reviews.Content: What can I say , no complaints on this one. Yes the keyboard keys are small, but the phone is small. The settings are sensible and easy to access. The connection quality is superb and has never dropped a call.  Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: No Display
Reviews.Author: J. Arnold "JJ"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and the display went out in three weeks and no one would ever respond to my request as to the warranty on this phone. You would think it would be at least 60 days. This is the second LG phone we bought that the screen went out. I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: false advertising.
Reviews.Author: ET
Reviews.Content: It was advertised as touchscreen but was not!  Useless for anything except manually dialing each call.  Otherwise every action had to be done through the keypad.

Reviews.Title: Does not keep a charge
Reviews.Author: Tena Holmgren
Reviews.Content: I like the phone itself but the battery sucks. Does not keep charged for long and even when it does stay charged long enough. If I fully charge it and turn it off, when i turn it on it says that it is going dead. I got cut off from a very important phone call (a one time deal) because it just magically turned off on me. I am very very dissapointed. I hope they let me return it. I have had it less than 2 months.The rest of the phone is fine, but I can't deal with a chargeless phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone instead of Smart phone.
Reviews.Author: Juan H. Lagarde "lagardi"
Reviews.Content: Got for my mom and sister at the same time. Mom doesn't know how to use the smart phones with the sliding of the screen with finger and probably will never. Sister uses it to text and boy can she text. Both are happy and so am I, because it gets charge cheaper as a non smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Decent phone
Reviews.Author: jordan p
Reviews.Content: I had just got this phone. It's pretty good but it's not full touch screen it's only for dialing and keeping the phone from sleep mode. It also DOES'NT have an fm radio.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: drm012
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom who refused to get a smart phone. She loved it. One of the best easy-to-use basic phones out there.

Reviews.Title: Bad battery, bad phone
Reviews.Author: K. Frame
Reviews.Content: Not a fan.  We had the phone for a month before the phone died.  Also, the product description said that it had an AM/FM radio, which is why my daughter picked this model.  Well, if it has this feature it's so well hidden that it's impossible to find.  I would have returned the phone, but I was too busy over the holidays and lost track of the latest possible return date.  Stay away!

Reviews.Title: Look Elsewhere
Reviews.Author: lw campers
Reviews.Content: I have had a few phones in my day and this was not one of my favs.  I ended up getting something alot newer for less.  I like LG but go with a smartphone

Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 1900 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: LG Neon II GW370 (Rumour Plus) Unlocked GSM Phone with Touchscreen, QWERTY Keyboard, 2MP Camera, GPS, Bluetooth, FM Radio and microSD Slot - Orange/Grey
